an3.26:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo.
an3.26:1.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.26:1.5: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatva garum katva sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.26:1.6: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo?
an3.26:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo hino hoti silena samadhina pannaya.
an3.26:1.8: Evarupo, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo annatra anuddaya annatra anukampa.
an3.26:2.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo?
an3.26:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sadiso hoti silena samadhina pannaya.
an3.26:2.3: Evarupo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.26:2.5: Silasamannagatanam satam silakatha ca no bhavissati, sa ca no pavattini bhavissati, sa ca no phasu bhavissati.
an3.26:2.6: Samadhisamannagatanam satam samadhikatha ca no bhavissati, sa ca no pavattini bhavissati, sa ca no phasu bhavissati.
an3.26:2.7: Pannasamannagatanam satam pannakatha ca no bhavissati, sa ca no pavattini bhavissati, sa ca no phasu bhavissatiti.
an3.26:2.8: Tasma evarupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.26:3.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatva garum katva sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo?
an3.26:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo adhiko hoti silena samadhina pannaya.
an3.26:3.3: Evarupo, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatva garum katva sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.26:3.5: Iti aparipuram va silakkhandham paripuressami, paripuram va silakkhandham tattha tattha pannaya anuggahessami;
an3.26:3.6: aparipuram va samadhikkhandham paripuressami, paripuram va samadhikkhandham tattha tattha pannaya anuggahessami;
an3.26:3.7: aparipuram va pannakkhandham paripuressami, paripuram va pannakkhandham tattha tattha pannaya anuggahessamiti.
an3.26:3.8: Tasma evarupo puggalo sakkatva garum katva sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.26:3.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasminti.
